definition: milkshake (Note: 昔[xi1] is loaned from English "shake" via Cantonese 昔, pr. sik1)

sentences.english: So, you can make 2N different types of milkshakes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你一共可以做2N中不同口味的奶昔。

sentences.english: The fruit can also be juiced or used to make delicious sorbets or milkshakes.
sentences.chinese: 水果也可以雞肋或用來製造美味或水果奶昔。

sentences.english: and you can get it all mixed up in one, it's called the Neapolitan shake.
sentences.chinese: 也可以都混在一起，叫拿波利奶昔。

sentences.english: Milkshakes are a time-honored tradition in America.
sentences.chinese: 奶昔在美國可謂歷史悠久。

sentences.english: My husband and I put this in smoothies with frozen fruit, soy powder, juice and a banana, everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我老公和我每天把粉加在水果，黃豆粉，香蕉奶昔裏。

sentences.english: Half of the participants drank a sterile milkshake as a placebo instead.
sentences.chinese: 一半的參與者喝無菌奶昔作爲安慰劑。

sentences.english: I made a quick smoothie today that I just love.
sentences.chinese: 今天我爲大家做一道我超愛的奶昔。

sentences.english: I want a strawberry sundae, instead of a milkshake.
sentences.chinese: 我想來一個草莓聖代，就不要奶昔了。

sentences.english: The sit-down has run out of chocolate shake.
sentences.chinese: 那家快餐店的巧克力奶昔賣完了。

sentences.english: I enjoy beetroot and kale smoothies with a dash of turmeric and ground pepper.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡甜菜根和甘藍奶昔，外加少許薑黃和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I'd like a large orange juice and a vanilla shake.
sentences.chinese: 我要一杯大杯柳橙汁和一杯香草奶昔。

sentences.english: Don’t order milkshake or sugary soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 不要點奶昔或含糖的軟飲料。

sentences.english: And then your friend says, "I wanna order three milkshakes."
sentences.chinese: 這時你的朋友說，“我還想再點三個奶昔。”

sentences.english: Can you tell me how to make the banana milkshake?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我怎樣做香蕉奶昔嗎？

sentences.english: A BigMac , 2 orders of fries and a milkshake .
sentences.chinese: 一個牛肉漢堡，2份薯條和一份奶昔。
